channel.title: Begginer coder need help with effects =\
channel.description:
Need help getting barrows armor to do its effects, dh is only working one for me atm. I wat the guthans to heal to.. Iwould also like to know how to get ancients to work correctly, meaning for it to freeze a npc or a player after its attackedwith and ice spell. The blood spellz to heal like 25% of wat dammage is delt to enemy.. And if anyone would know how to fix rangeing so that u can range from a distance?(with the arrow flying)
I would realy appreciate it. TY, in advance ~Tim~
